wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Brackenbury Lacey (26 October 1911 – 4 October 1988) was a British character actress and ballet teacher. She appeared in over 30 films between 1957 and 1985, usually playing a sweet old lady or motherly figure in minor roles.

response: * Margaret Lacey as Mrs. Whistler, a teacher and diamond smuggler.
